sentences.sContent: I hated those cold winter mornings.
sentences.sCn: 我讨厌冬天里寒冷的早晨。

sentences.sContent: I’m not feeling very well this morning.
sentences.sCn: 今天早上我觉得不大舒服。

sentences.sContent: He stayed in bed late on Sunday morning.
sentences.sCn: 星期日早上他睡到很晚。

sentences.sContent: She took the early morning train.
sentences.sCn: 她搭乘了一大早的火车。

sentences.sContent: ...I was still rewriting my midterm the morning it was due...
...and then they woke up earlier than usual the next morning thanks to summer nights...
...How does the man spend his time on the morning train...
...She goes there every morning to write up her stories and send them to Paris...
...getting to a factory by 6 o’clock each morning is torture...

phrases.pCn: 凌晨之后；宿醉，酒醉后的影响
孕妇晨吐；孕妇怀孕初期的反应

trans.tranOther: the early part of the day, from when the sun rises until 12 o’clock in the middle of the day
